website_summaries.verdict: A good selection of Stage 2 organic baby foods.
pros: Each pouch features simple ingredients with a resealable lid
cons: The pouch with yogurt would not be appropriate for babies with dairy allergies

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Me Hydrated
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hot environment for 10 hours a day during the summertime, and I am probably not your typical baby food eater, but this is an excellent source of energy and it doesn't upset my stomach. This is an excellent choice over a candy bar or a granola bar in my situation. One of these every few hours with an electrolyte tablet does the trick and keeps me on the ball. Even though I am tired when I get off shift, I don't feel drained. Oh, and these taste great too.
customer_reviews.author: Will R

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this is a wonderful product but if your child does have allergies just ...
customer_reviews.text: I can only give you my input on one flavor: Pear, Apple, Broccoli. Let me state that my child does have an egg allergy. I know this doesn't say it contains any eggs, and I'm sure it doesn't but wanted to state that she does have an allergy. She had one pouch without any other dietary changes and her next diaper change, all of the skin had burn off her booty. I'm sure this is a wonderful product but if your child does have allergies just give them a little at first to make sure they do not have a mild reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Quality Control or Consistency
customer_reviews.text: The first item we bought was excellent, the flavor the texture, my little one LOVED it! So, I purchased that flavor again and another flavor to try. There appears to not be any quality control because the flavor I had purchased again wasn't good. The texture was grainier and the flavor was horrible. It didn't even taste remotely the same (we taste EVERYTHING she eats). The other flavor we tried was plain pears and it didn't taste right either. Tasted fermented like cider does. We won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! My son has a rare food allergy diagnosis called FPIES and so I have to be extremely careful to buy food with minimal and honest ingredients. I used to make all of my son’s purées, but now that he is older and I am working, I had to find food I could trust. Mama Bear Products are awesome, I cannot recommend them enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Auslander

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These pouches don’t have a ton of foreign ingredients, let alone a ton of ingredients. Simple packaging and super tasty. My 8 year old is always forced by his ten month old sister to taste her food. She “shares” with him and he’s just so sweet he doesn’t want to discourage her. This food he was actually delighted to try. He even ate one for his after school snack instead of applesauce twice this week. The pouches are affordable and always my first choice as a go to snack for my kids. 5 out of 5 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aarons Lady

customer_reviews.title: Organic, gluten free and ZERO ADDED SUGAR
customer_reviews.text: SOOO MAMY THINGS TO LOVE 1) literally kids of all ages love these my toddler and my 6 year old both eat them! 2) they are gluten free 3) THERE IS ZERO ADDED SUGAR 4) organic 5) they are 12.60 for 12 (when you use subscribe and save) which literally makes them $1.05 a pouch !!!!!! 6) they taste exactly the same if not better to top brands!!! THESE ARE A MUST TRY!
customer_reviews.author: Casteel

customer_reviews.title: I should have caved sooner
customer_reviews.text: So I'm kind of a health nut, and I used to make fresh purees for my kids every morning. I don't know why, but the pouches always used to turn me off. Then we tried them for a road trip and we were hooked. The kids love them, they don't need to be refrigerated, and I don't have to prep the puree or clean the blender anymore. We used to buy another brand with a rabbit, but these are almost $1 cheaper per pouch, so we made the switch and the kids like them just as much - if not more! I like some of the Mama Bear flavors more too (good mix of fruits and veggies). Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date -2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from Amazon.com Services LLC the product had an expiration date of 2 weeks. Gave it away because it was needed in the summer. Items like this should have a few years before they expire and usually do.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Foster

customer_reviews.title: price increase :(
customer_reviews.text: High quality ingredients, tastes good and my LO likes it, but a bit watery (aka it can get all over everything if squeezed to tight or shaken). The reason for 3 stars is the increase in price. I purchased them a couple weeks ago for $14 and now they are $17, which makes it more expensive or the same price as the fruit pouches at Target or the local market. I would repurchase the product at $14 or less, but not at the current price.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mijares

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size pouch for a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: These are so great for toddlers on the go. At home I can easily give my child freshly prepared fruit, but sometimes you need something you can grab on your way out the door that could make or break your shopping trip, hike, road trip, etc. This is a larger serving than any of the other apple sauce pouches I've found so far, and is the perfect serving size for my toddler. With the typical smaller pouches I have to pack two, after the first one is gone he cries for more but he rarely finishes the second pouch.i appreciate that these are organizing, larger servings, and with good fruit combos.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Tudor Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Low calories wondering about the nutrition
customer_reviews.text: My daughter demanded three in a row. It wasn’t until the next day that I read the nutrition facts. It is basically carbs (13g), sugar (10g), fiber (1g), and sodium (30mg).
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for adults too!
customer_reviews.text: Buying these for myself. Chronic gi trouble and swallowing difficulty its nice to have a few ready to eat options rather than having to pull out the blender and strainer for a snack. Perfect crisp pear flavor, sweet but not sickening, great serving size. My only complaint is no clear window to view contents. Being immune compromised the potential for a mouth full of mold is terrifying and disgusting. At home though i don't like it i can squeeze it into a bowl. That's not an option on the go so i much prefer the clear window style.
customer_reviews.author: LongHairedHippie

customer_reviews.title: Great product all around!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for many reasons but the biggest one being that my son loves this and will always eat one of these packets when offered one. Other reasons to love it: organic, good size, super convenient, great price, part of Amazon subscription so I don’t even have to think about it (huge plus!), and if I’m hungry I can have one too :)
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Imported ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These are slightly runnier than other brands. My son will eat these but not finish a pouch like he does with similar sizes from other brands. I'm disappointed by the label not being more clear about where the fruit is sourced. What are they trying to hide by stating it's made in the US with imported ingredients? Why not just say where each fruit comes from(even if it lists 3 possibilities). I would have definitely reordered if it wasn't for them being unclear on the origin.
customer_reviews.author: Tim N

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves these. Do not buy the “Sprout” ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these. Do not buy the “Sprout” brand - baby hates them all and they won’t let a review be left if it isn’t a 4-5 star. Just an FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Lerner

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good taste
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to have at my daughter's first birthday for other little guests. I have to confess that I did it because the brand was much more affordable than the ones I usually feed my daughter. However, I'm very pleasantly surprised. In taste, texture, food combos and ingredients, this brand is pretty comparable to higher-end brands. I have become a fan. My daughter loves them and gobbles them up. My one quibble is the lack of variety, especially more savory flavors. I wish there were more protein-centered pouches that featured ingredients like poultry or beef. Other than that, thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Loved by all
customer_reviews.text: My one year old son, 6 year old daughter and 27 year old wife love these. My son loves the flavor, the pouch size that he can easily hold and feed himself with and the cover he can twist on and off and put in his mouth. My daughter loves the 'juice' Mommy and Daddy bought and my wife loves that its organic and so FULL of delicious flavor that the kids have no problem drinking it. Occasionally, I see her enjoying one for herself!
customer_reviews.author: vanreko

customer_reviews.title: my baby refusing it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when for my 6 months old baby, unfortunately after having a little taste of this, he doesn't want to open his mouth and refuse to open his mouth, sadly he didn't like it ; to be fair- I tried it , and it did taste like regular apple sauce, maybe he doesn't like apple sauce. I guess it's a hit and miss depending on the baby and it is a miss for my baby .
customer_reviews.author: Aaflo

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a baby I know and love. I was hoping that she would let me ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a baby I know and love. I was hoping that she would let me have a taste but she wasn't in a sharing mood, which can only be attributed to her enthusiasm for the Mango Apple Carrot Peach sauce in the pouch. I have seen her turn up her nose at plenty of other food so this must be particularly yummy. One more thing: This granny thinks that baby food in pouch is a really clever idea--I wish they had these around when my adult children were little things!
customer_reviews.author: ebc_from_ct

customer_reviews.title: Tastes sour
customer_reviews.text: These tasted almost sour to me and my little guy didn't like them (and he eats just about everything). In my experience, the organic yogurt pouches always taste sour to me. I'd love for the packaging to have a clear area so you can see if it's bad. I love the convenience of pouches but doesn't matter when you kid won't eat them because they taste bad.
customer_reviews.author: cmm318

customer_reviews.title: One of the pouches leaked and when I opened the box it had black mold everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: One of the pouches leaked and when I opened the box it had black mold everywhere. Usually, Amazon brand is much better quality than this. I hadn't seen the mold and had fed my baby a pouch from there, that was seemingly clean. Eeek. She seems fine, but I was freaked out.
customer_reviews.author: avr1891

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves all the flavors.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this product. She eats all the flavors and has since she was 6 months old. I still buy these now that she's almost 2 as a way to help get her fruits and veggies in her diet. Even when she's not feeling well or is picky, she will still usually eat one of these pouches. They are really convenient on the go, and make a great snack. They also contain more food than similarly priced pouches from other companies like Gerber, so I feel like I'm getting more bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: abf313

customer_reviews.text: My boys love these. It’s a great way to get in some fruits and veggies. I love packing them for car rides or long doctors appts. They are a fantastic healthy snack and my boys gobble them up.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Farrell

customer_reviews.title: You wont love it until you try it!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old have tried the apple flavor 12 pack and although she ate it she showed signs that it was not her favorite. She took her time to eat it and she will eat half a pouch at a time. However the apple banana yogurt strawberry has been the best so far. She ate the whole pouch in the matter of minutes. The fact that its organic is a plus! Will continue buying more flavors as long as she continues to like them and mama approves!
customer_reviews.author: tinoeast14k

customer_reviews.title: Great product just watch the expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these for awhile and they are great I just received a shipment today and the expire in November of this year... most of the others gave me at least six months with a toddler that goes from all in on something to barely eating it three months is not enough time on a squeeze pouch. Also wish they were in clear pouches always paranoid about mold but I have not had an issue wth them yet
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've put these in my kids lunches for several years (I know they're for toddlers, but they're really healthy and my "big kids" still like them. I've shopped around and these seems to be one of the best deals out there per ounce - especially on Subscribe and Save. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and easy for on the go
customer_reviews.text: The taste of these puree pouches is just great. My twin toddlers love this combination of flavors. I love that they are organic. That these pouches are organic is important to me because I want my kids to have healthy snacks. The puree has a nice texture and is not runny and the flavor is not too sweet. These pouches are great for on the go and to put in the diaper bag. I love that they come in different flavors with fruit and vegetable varieties. I really recommend these pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrika

customer_reviews.title: Flavor ok, Leakage in Pouches
customer_reviews.text: Dislike - It came in 2 well packaged boxes containing 6 pouches each. I had no issues with the first box, but the second box had pouches with food outside (see pic). Packaging is not damaged, so I believe it did not happen during transit. I don't feel safe giving it to my baby. The rating is because of damaged product and not for the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Thiagarajan

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and even older kids liked it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go inside of a birthday party lunch box for my toddler and her friends. All of the kids up to 5 years old got one and they all enjoyed them. Tried one myself before I gave it to them and it is super yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Faith R.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Yummy pears! Nice consistency, not too thin or thick. Gotta admit that I eat this as an adult, not for a baby, although my 2 yr old loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Glory

customer_reviews.title: Love the price, product is sour. Toddler refuses them.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 2 stars for two reasons: A: It is cheap on subscribe and save B: the product is organic. Unfortunately, my toddler, that eats every other pouch under the sun from any other brand, refused from day 1 to eat any flavor of this brand. He won't even touch them if I offer them to him. I even tried them myself and they are watery and sour, every single flavor they offer. So here i have multiple boxes of these from subscribe and save and my kid won't eat them. Love the price, not the product
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: These are priced well for the quality that you’re getting. My 16mo twins love these so much that I have three flavors set up on automatic reorder. I use these as a snack, not a meal replacement and they do just the job to tide the kids over between meals or after a long play session outside.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alonzai

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product. Less natural than competition
customer_reviews.text: Overall good and affordable product. Would like to see them use less ingredients and stick to the main products and lemon juice as a preservative. This puree is thicker than most but my 6 month old who just started solids does great eating it. I taste all my babies food. If I won't eat it. Why should he. This one passes the test and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a box that expired quite soon, and at least 3 of the pouches had to be thrown away when I opened them because they had crusted fruit around the mouthpiece. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Annie G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor seal on the cap
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were on sale and my kiddo loves fruit pouches. I love that she gets her fruit and veggie servings without a debate about eating them! However, these pouches didn't seem to be sealed correctly and I worried she was going to get sick from eating them. She finished a couple before I realized all the seals were suspect, so I tossed the rest. She didn't get sick, so I guess that's good, but the packets need to be redesigned.
customer_reviews.author: M. Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Pumpkin Apple Peach Buckwheat
customer_reviews.text: Even though my youngest is 2, we still rely on pouches for a convenient way to get some nutrition into him. While I thought it tasted fine, he doesn't seem to like the flavor of this one too much. He will eat it, but it's always his last choice.
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's favorite flavor. Compared to the higher-end store brands, these are every bit as good. My daughter has yet to reject a flavor! They show up every month in our subscribe and save order and the flavors have continued to change and evolve, which is good for growing food-curious​ kids!
customer_reviews.author: Jamey L. Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: Son likes
customer_reviews.text: Mine was short dated arrived may 1 2020 Expires may 14 2020. I got 2 boxes of 6. I'm not using them daily just for long car rides. Other then that either it being a mistake or just trying to push them. My son 2.5 yr old really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Aireal O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it,she is almost 8 months and she eat two at a single meal 😂 She sakes her hed at the taste of sweet and sour, then she opens her mouth for more 😂😂 Great price,came on time,nice packed.I would order again, I definitely recommend.Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snacks
customer_reviews.text: These pouches from Amazon's brand Mama Bear are really quite good. We don' t have kids, and actually use these as healthier snack options for ourselves. They taste good, don't have added sugar or fake flavors, and are a great way to eat more produce.
customer_reviews.author: Radar626Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It's mostly lemon
customer_reviews.text: I stupidly thought "apple" would be kind of like apple sauce 😆 my baby kind of tried it, hated it, and we went to the store to buy a real brand. It's not horrible, to adult taste buds, but unacceptable for babies. It's very lemon strong.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The foods look fresh and smell good. The baby loves these foods. Foods on store shelves sometimes look so dark and are unpleasant to smell. Not this brand. I’m sold on them but wish there were more flavors. And they’re less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydee

customer_reviews.title: Great for my picky eater
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky eater and she loves these pear pouches! She won't eat actual pears but she will happily eat one of these pouches. It's difficult to find "just pears" without other added fruits and veggies; glad these are offered!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: My baby is fairly picky when it comes to pouches as he did baby led weaning and prefers self feeding finger foods but he loves these pouches for a nice on the go easy snack or meal. Will be purchasing again, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Delicious food. Not just for babies.
customer_reviews.text: I eat these, as an adult. They make great shelf-stable snacks for keeping in my backpack. Perfect for staving off "hangry" feelings or lightheadedness while on the go... a healthy non-messy snack on plane trips, drives, bike commutes, or bus rides. The flavor is yummy, and there are no added sugars or unnecessary filler ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer of stuff

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: As a stage 2 food item they are kinda watery. I have to add a little cereal to thicken for my kiddo. Good food mixture though.
customer_reviews.author: Pologirl846

customer_reviews.title: Yogurt and no added sugar!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product with yogurt that isn't loaded with added sugar! This is a quality product for a great price. It tastes delicious, baby and I both think so. But the best part is that it has yogurt for added protein but doesn't have a bunch of sugar added to it. It's a staple item in my pantry now.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee

customer_reviews.title: I love the package and taste!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 8 months baby and he love it! And me too, the presentation and practicy on the go. My baby can enjoy it easily anywhere :)
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Chaidez

customer_reviews.title: Love these baby food
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was available when my kids were babies! I bought these for myself as my snacks. It's great taste, organic, no preservatives, not much sugar, low calories and healthy. Flavor is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: majmz

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a very picky eater. I bought these just to test out to see if she would even try it. For some reason she loves this pouch! The packaging is cute. It’s not overwhelming so my girl won’t get distracted. I’ve tried all the expensive ones from other stores and she hates it. This is a must
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Aclan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Found bugs in food and pouches leaked.
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrives I realized that one of the pouches had exploded and leaks over the majority of the other pouches, something I was willing to look past as it’s 100° plus weather in our area. When I’m not willing to look past is the fact that I found a very small bug in the baby food as I was feeding it to my six month old. Not OK. When I’m buying organic that doesn’t mean that I want bugs included in my daughters meal.. Plus it was in one of the sealed ones, so it’s not like it had a hole that the bug could get into.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Toddler likes it, mama can’t handle the smell
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old liked these which is wonderful because she doesn’t always want to eat veggies. I just wish they smelled better because even though I like broccoli, the smell made me gag. She finished the pack but I won’t buy this kind again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Check expiration date
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 box's, my 1 year old liked it. But after I went thru the 1st box and opened the 2nd, 3 weeks later found that they expired. So that sucked. These normally have a pretty long shelf life so I didn't think to check when the came in
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: No way. My kids won’t eat them.
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers are not a fan of these at all. They’re very runny and get messy quickly. I tried them and they don’t taste good. My kids aren’t picky and won’t pick these out of the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Maizy86Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is off
customer_reviews.text: Not a great flavor. My son did not enjoy it and so I tried it. Had a rather "dirty" carrot flavor
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't need refrigeration until opened!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this yogurt and I love it too, because it doesn't have to take up space in my refrigerator! Unless he doesn't eat the whole pouch after opening then it doesn't need to be refrigerated! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BigSis10

customer_reviews.title: Great for On the Go
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 9 month year old. Thought it sounded like a nice fall flavor. He loves it. We keep one in his diaper bag at all times for emergency snack. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Badon

customer_reviews.title: Tastes more of fruit puree than yoghurt
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a yoghurt option for my 7 month old so I bought this but it tastes more of fruit than yoghurt. There's barely a discernable yoghurt taste in it. I'll stick to known brands
customer_reviews.author: Haleemah

customer_reviews.title: Too watery
customer_reviews.text: My son (11 months) liked the way it taste but the consistency was so watery that both of us were covered in it by the time I finished feeding it to him. Tried it straight from the tube and by pouring it onto a spoon. It drips everywhere regardless. If there’s air bubbles and you squeeze the content out, it pops/projectiles into the air and lands in your lap or your dining chair or on your baby’s face.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi331

customer_reviews.title: Twins won't eat this smelly stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Love the price, and really hoped to like this product, especially with a fruit and vegetable mix. Unfortunately neither of my 1 year old twins would eat it, even my little one that eats anything. The smell is horrible!! Has to be the broccoli's fault. We will try other flavors but now I'm stuck with a box and a half. Maybe a variety pack of different flavors would have allowed me to see what the kids would eat before having to buy such a big quantity.
customer_reviews.author: DKF368

customer_reviews.title: These are a good price compared to the organic pouches available at my ...
customer_reviews.text: My tot loves the Mama Bear Organic baby foods. We have tried several of the flavors and he likes them all. These are a good price compared to the organic pouches available at my local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to order and cross one thing off the list.
customer_reviews.text: I should have tried this brand sooner. I've been making trips to all the grocery stores to get a variety of flavors. I finally decided to just order in bulk. My daughter is a little picky but she likes this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: KmmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and Quality Issue/Canceling Subscribe and Save
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pouches in the last box I received (February 2019) has what looks like machine grease or ink on the outside of the pouch. It comes off on your hands when touching the pouch. I won't be giving these to my baby anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: So delicious
customer_reviews.text: It is very good, some other with the same fruits don’t taste as good. I consume all the products my baby eats so I can tell the difference between them and what she is having.
customer_reviews.author: yancarlos m.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and good price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and I feel like it's a good flavor to give him with the spinach. He doesn't eat vegetables well so I have to rely on these a lot. I wish they had more flavors with good vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leible

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is a strange child but I'm happy overall.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old doesn't like these from the pouch even tho she likes other pouches. I made them into fruit sheets(fruit roll up) and she loves it so I'm not sure what the problem is lol. Overall I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cordelia

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these and I do too!
customer_reviews.text: They love the flavor and I love that they can get some veggies in while they think they are having a treat. We have these on subscription each month for my 3 year old and 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: JAT

customer_reviews.title: Seller no trustable
customer_reviews.text: I gave overall 1star because they gave me something that is going to expire soon,so it is an old lot! I don't like to be played, so i won't buy it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the Mama Bear brand and has enjoyed every flavor that I have bought. If I am writing a review, it is because we bought this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging, terrible flavor.
customer_reviews.text: The only nice things about this food is its packaging. Our baby, who is a good eater, refused to eat more after one bite. So we tried it. Whoa. Overpowering broccoli (like, if you burned broccoli and then puréed it). It kinda tasted like it had gone bad. Sorry, but it wasn’t edible.
customer_reviews.author: jp22

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves them
customer_reviews.text: I received these today and my 11 month old loves them. I was not sure to order online for baby pouch food but im glad I did. I usually buy them at grocery store and spend twice as much for them. Highly recommend for when on the go. I tasted them and not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dkhill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and texture
customer_reviews.text: This pear puree is so great. If you compare it to other organic brands you can CLEARLY see how much smoother this is. It is much easier on my baby's stomach because it's blended so well. Trying other flavors soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging problems, product is good.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the flavor of this pouch, delivery was timely. However one of the pouches had become punctured and leaked all over the inside of the box of pouches. Yuck! Was not fun to open a box with nasty rotten banana smeared inside!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My girls love these pouches!
customer_reviews.text: I get these pouches delivered once a month, and my 4 and 6 year old daughters eat them up the first week we have them! I love that they get a dose of veggies, even if there is a bit of sugar... ;)
customer_reviews.author: cclochridge

customer_reviews.title: Daughters like them
customer_reviews.text: Wish they had a veggie in them, but otherwise, these are great and a better price than the Gerber ones (not on sale). No complaints from my littles and no issues with packing/shipping/expiration dates.
customer_reviews.author: SDinDC

customer_reviews.title: Broccoli flavor is too strong
customer_reviews.text: The broccoli flavor is too strong so my kids did not like it.
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Great value brand
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the $ but my son will not eat the mango carrot one. Go figure because I thought he would have preferred it over the green spinach flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great value and taste!
customer_reviews.text: We love this brand of baby food! My one year and and three year old both ask for these and suck them down quickly! Great prices too!
customer_reviews.author: Padawanmom

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: These are my son’s favorite!! He likes these better than the yogurt ones. I will be purchasing other flavors for him. These are easy to pack and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Adartse

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, underwhelmed.
customer_reviews.text: For a generic brand this is way overpriced based on the kids’ reaction. I’d rather pay a fraction more and get the name brand food for my kid from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Luis Obispo

customer_reviews.title: good for more than babies
customer_reviews.text: There’s only lost a star because my older son in junior high likes them but didn’t want them at school because they said baby food
customer_reviews.author: DMLB

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and consistency
customer_reviews.text: You can taste the apple and strawberry flavors. Convenient to take with you for children's snacks. Easy to squeeze and eat.
customer_reviews.author: True Primer 22

customer_reviews.title: Love the pumpkin flavor
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old twins love the toddler flavor. While they are mostly eating solid food now I keep pouches on hand for snacks in the car and in the diaper bag. I like that they are healthy and flavorful at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Greatly received product in a nice, large size
customer_reviews.text: I buy these as treats for my grand babies when they come to visit. The larger size is not only a good deal but satisfies eager appetites!
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Watery and Thin
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. It was a reasonable price especially with the subscribe & save 20% discount. However, I was disappointed in the consistency of the product. It was extremely watery and thin making it a mess to feed my daughter. I transfer from packet to spoon and this product would spill quite a bit. I would have preferred it to be a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: For moms and kids alike (trust me!)
customer_reviews.text: My kid lives the eff out of these! They're great for babies and toddlers, sure, but they're exceptional for the tween kid (like mine) who *swears* they hate veggies! No, mamas, they don't. And these packets will save your sanity.
customer_reviews.author: WildSngrNY

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it...except when he doesn't
customer_reviews.text: My son has a love/hate relationship with this. Sometimes he eats the whole thing and sometimes just not up for it. However, I consider it a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Watery, good for mixing with other food
customer_reviews.text: I have discontinued my subscription for this product for now because the prices were raised. I barely liked it when I first bought it at the great deal that I did because it has the consistency of a watery smoothie, so I liked it as a breakfast meal or to mix it up with oatmeal for taste.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Not my LOs favorite
customer_reviews.text: Dozen food packs arrivied quickly. Our daughter has loved other food brands and other flavors from this brand, but wasn’t too keen on this one. Wish it was more vegetable forward.
customer_reviews.author: JoeW

customer_reviews.title: Seem good
customer_reviews.text: These seem great- I tried to sub these for my daughter for another brand but she will only eat the “yellow” ones. So... if you could make the package yellow- that would be great lol 😂 I’m joking- mostly- but really...
customer_reviews.author: KTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for on-the-go snacks/meals! I love that it is organic & healthy for my daughter to eat with the convienence of not having to hand mix her anything. She LOVES the taste and I will be buying these again
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy & nutritious
customer_reviews.text: The Mama Bear food pouches make it easy to ensure our baby gets his nutrients in a safe and concenient package. Our baby loves the strawberry/banana, spinach/apple, and apricot/millet flavors. Grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Blown away
customer_reviews.text: I like how little space these pouches take up and how much they hold. While my son won't actually eat out of them, they are easy to transfer over into what he uses to eat. Flavor-wise they are better than other baby foods. We're trying different packs but so far I'm extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly.W.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these pouches!
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like the mama bear pouches. It’s a great deal on subscribe and save and I know my kids are getting something healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Little Man Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves these flavors! He's not a picky eater by any means but he gets really excited when he sees the white pouch come out.
customer_reviews.author: Kuma16

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved this
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of two boys under 4 years old, I buy a lot of different brands of pouches. They loved this flavor so much, the pouches disappeared within a week. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lozy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mom on the go!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a busy mom, and your little one is on solids, you NEED these. It helps with hand-eye coordination, and it also helps with a hungry baby in the middle of target screaming. Mom tasted and approved!
customer_reviews.author: Hagen

customer_reviews.title: YUM. I keep one in my purse for work ...
customer_reviews.text: YUM. I keep one in my purse for work and in my backpack for school. Real lifesaver when my bloodsugar drops, also they seem hydrating!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are economically priced
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 months old and loves these pouches! She actually get's angry when she finishes one lol, so I can only assume she likes the taste. I love that they are economically priced. I wish Amazon would make the pouches clear, so you can see the internal content (similar to Happy Baby Clearly Crafted Pouches), but other than that, I think these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney W.

customer_reviews.title: A great on the go snack!
customer_reviews.text: Neatly packaged and haven't run across a single bad pouch. Daughter loves them so it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand - Mama Bear Organic Baby Food, Stage 2, Apple Banana, 4 Ounce Pouch (Pack of 12)
feature_bullets: Twelve 4-ounce pouches of stage 2 baby food, for babies 6+ months
USDA Organic, non-GMO ingredients, gluten free
Made in the U.S.A. from U.S. and imported ingredients
Satisfaction Guarantee: We’re proud of our products. If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase. 1-877-485-0385
